TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CollectionConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供用于在集合对象与其他各种表示形式之间实现相互转换的类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert collection objects to and from various other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于此类型转换器方法始终返回`null`，和方法始终返回`false`。The method for this type converter always returns `null`, and the method always returns `false`. 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅基类和[如何： 实现类型转换器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). > [!NOTE] > 决不要创建的实例类。You should never create an instance of the class. 而应调用 类的 方法。Instead, call the method of the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例基类。For more information, see the examples in the base class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object ConvertTo (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, object value, Type destinationType);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance object ConvertTo(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, object value, class System.Type destinationType) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ConvertTo (context As ITypeDescriptorContext, culture As CultureInfo, value As Object, destinationType As Type) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ ConvertTo(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context, System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ culture, System::Object ^ value, Type ^ destinationType);

param.name: context
param.span: 一个 ，用于提供格式上下文。

span.span: An that provides a format context.

param.name: culture
param.span: value 将要转换成的区域性。

span.span: The culture to which value will be converted.

param.name: value

span.span: The to convert.

param.span: 此参数必须从 继承。

span.span: This parameter must inherit from .
The to convert the value to.

summary.span: 将给定的值对象转换为指定的目标类型。

span.span: Converts the given value object to the specified destination type.

returns.span: 一个 ，它表示转换后的值。

span.span: An that represents the converted value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 此参数可能为 `null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象的属性可以返回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`. > [!NOTE] > 转换后的结果将显示在属性浏览器。The converted result will be shown in the property browser. 例如，如果要将 char 集合转换为字符串，它将显示为`char[] collection`。For example, if you are converting a char collection into a string, it will be displayed as `char[] collection`.

span.span: is .
The conversion cannot be performed.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection GetProperties (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, object value, Attribute[] attributes);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection GetProperties(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, object value, class System.Attribute[] attributes) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetProperties (context As ITypeDescriptorContext, value As Object, attributes As Attribute()) As PropertyDescriptorCollection

public: override System::ComponentModel::PropertyDescriptorCollection ^ GetProperties(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context, System::Object ^ value, cli::array <Attribute ^> ^ attributes);

param.name: context
param.span: 一个 ，用于提供格式上下文。

span.span: An that provides a format context.

param.name: value
param.span: 一个 ，它指定要为其获取属性的数组的类型。

span.span: An that specifies the type of array to get the properties for.

param.name: attributes
param.span: 一个将用作筛选器的 类型的数组。

span.span: An array of type that will be used as a filter.

summary.span: 使用指定的上下文和特性获取由值参数指定的数组类型的属性集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of properties for the type of array specified by the value parameter using the specified context and attributes.

returns.span: 具有为此数据类型公开的属性的 ；或者如果没有属性，则为 。

span.span: A with the properties that are exposed for this data type, or if there are no properties.
This method always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 此参数可能为 `null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象的属性可以返回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`. 在中传递的属性数组将用于筛选数组。The attributes array that you pass in will be used to filter the array. 属性可以具有多种和对象。The attributes can have a mix of and objects. 筛选由以下规则定义：Filtering is defined by the following rules: - A对象将被视为通配符; 它将与匹配的任何属性都具有属性其集中。A object will be treated as a wildcard; it will match any property that has the in its set of attributes. - 如果属性不具有的同一个类，将不属性包括在返回的数组。If a property does not have an of the same class, the property will not be included in the returned array. - 如果属性是实例，该属性必须是完全匹配，或它不包括在返回的数组。If the attribute is an instance of , the property must be an exact match or it will not be included in the returned array. - 如果指定实例和它是默认属性，它将包括在返回的数组即使不没有的任何实例属性中。If an instance is specified and it is the default property, it will be included in the returned array even if there is no instance of the in the property. 集合不支持属性：因此，此方法始终返回`null`。Collections do not support properties; therefore, this method always returns `null`.

Public Overrides Function GetPropertiesSupported (context As ITypeDescriptorContext) As Boolean

param.name: context
param.span: 一个 ，用于提供格式上下文。

span.span: An that provides a format context.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示此对象是否支持属性。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether this object supports properties.

returns.span: 返回 ，因为不应调用 来查找此对象的属性。

span.span: because should not be called to find the properties of this object.
This method never returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 此参数可能为 `null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象的属性可以返回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`. 集合不支持属性：因此，此方法始终返回`false`。Collections do not support properties; therefore, this method always returns `false`.
